sentences.en: Designed to offer a sampling of what Americans are thinking, the letters are read by the president, and he sometimes answers them by hand, in black ink on azure paper.
sentences.cn: 选送民众来信供总统过目，旨在让总统了解美国民众的想法，总统要展阅这些来信，有时还要手书回信，回信是用黑墨水写在天蓝色信纸上的。

sentences.en: From eight to ten tonight he'll be at the Luna Azure up in the Bronx.

sentences.en: He has receding brown hair, his customary designer stubble and azure - blue eyes.

sentences.en: The breathtaking beauty of the rugged California wilderness has been captured under a clear, azure sky.

sentences.en: The peaks stood out in sharp relief against the azure sky.

sentences.en: The topmost round of his azure ladder had been reached by this time.

sentences.en: They were like bright pearls and stars in azure sky.
sentences.cn: 正如一粒粒的明珠,又如碧天里的星星.

sentences.en: This azure sky the point declares that road in our heart coloured.
